name: Howling Sphinx
text: If a monster is Flip Summoned: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in face-down Defense Position. Once per turn: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. If this card is Flip Summoned: Target 1 card you control and 1 card your opponent controls; Return them to the hand. You can only use this effect of "Howling Sphinx" once per turn.
